ogTitle: quote of the day: john dingell
ogDescription: former u.s. representative john dingell, the longest-serving member of congress in america's history, on why he chose a life of public service.

card_1.cardText:
> “…A _we work for a just and a humane and a decent society, where everybody has a chance to amount to something. And where we donat give handouts, but we give hands-up, so that people can grow._“

John Dingell

card_10.cardText:
On Thursday, former U.S. Representative John Dingell, the longest-serving member of Congress in America's history, passed away at 92. The Michigan democrat served in Congress for 59 years after winning 30 elections.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/19-02-08-qtd-john-dingell/)
